name: H#shP1p3
description:
Endless one button runner, you are a ship going down a pipe don't crash... oh and the ship is broken so you only have one button to go left and right, err but never straight!

Credits for Music:

"A Simple and Tranquil Journey" by InDeeperDreams - used for the menu
http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/713250

"Shooty Loop" by Benmode - user for game play
http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/551909
